snippet.title: Dökkálfheim Magical University
snippet.description:
Dokkalfheim Magical University is a turn based battle game in development using RPG Maker MV. The player builds teams of three witches out of a small selection of students and professors at the university as they protect the vulnerable world from the undead of fallen civilizations.Each witch has two basic spells and an ultimate spell which needs to be charged. The witches are categorized as:
Red Witches, whose spells target enemies
Blue Witches, whose spells target allies
Purple Witches, who have a mix of "red" and "blue" spells.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2714440/Dokkalfheim_Magical_University/
